myself two, three, or four times till I get what I want. I don't mind what they think of me." 
"Well, and to whom did you apply about Bory?" asked the countess. "You see yours is already an officer in the Guards, while my Nicholas is going as a cadet. There's no one to interest himself for him. To whom did you apply?" 
"To Prance Vasfli. He was so kind. He at once agreed to everything, and put the matter before the Emperor," said Princess Anna Mi- khdylovna enthusiastically, quite forgetting al
